title: A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
message:
A1707 EMC 3072, I didn't get it yet
but the client said, no image on the screen but kb backlight turn on, and some random colors and pixels on the touch bar.

maybe I will buy it, but I am afraid it will be a CPU/GPU issue and no fix

any ideas about this issue?

title: A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
message:
You should make more tests.
Need to check for USB activity and external video.
MLB should also be inspected, for possibly liquid damge.

title: A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
message: okay, i will get the MacBook next week, actually, I was afraid that this model had some issues with the CPU or GPU and this be one of the signs

title: A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
message:
If the backlight turns on the board is at least POSTing. By the symptoms you described I would suspect liquid damage. Most likely the LCD is bad and the touchbar has also had liquid ingress.
No idea what you are going to pay for this, but just expect a bad LCD, touchbar and probably keyboard. Then there is the gamble of any other issues with the board. I would not think this machine is worth more than $200.

title: A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
message:
I got the machine,
it boots, no image on the screen, but there is a backlight.
but I can see the mouse pointer in the top horizontal line, but the rest a black screen.
if the screen goes bad for any reason why the touchbar also had this pixel image?
the MacBook work on a second screen

title: A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
message:
So you get image on internal LCD, but missing backlight?
Did you test with known good LCD assembly?

Post 820-xxxx code of the MLB.

title: A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
message:
no there is a backlight
it is 820-00281-a
i didnt try a new lcd yet, have to buy a new one

title: A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
message:
"no image on the screen, but there is a backlight.
but I can see the mouse pointer in the top horizontal line, but the rest a black screen."
This is very confuse; please upload a photo...

title: A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
A1707, no image on screen, touch bar had random pixels colors
message:
If you get mouse cursor on the upper left corner, then you have image (also backlight).
However, machine is stuck there, if you cannot move the cursor.

Try USB OSX pendrive.
